duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain departmental and interdepartmental communications to ensure an efficient functioning Surgical Services Arena.
Answer phone calls courteously and maintain positive communication with staff, physicians, and other departments.
Perform general clerical duties and maintain adequate levels of office supplies and chart forms.
Accurately schedule emergency/add-on surgical procedures and monitor surgery schedule to assure maximum efficient use of resources.
Assist in the expedited patient flow between units, facilities, and departments.

education_certification.credential: Current AHA Basic Life Support for Healthcare Professional (AHA BLS Healthcare) - American Heart Association certification required.
1 Year in a hospital and/or medical setting (Preferred)
